item.title: everything, everywhere, all at once
item.description: Warning: spoilers for “Everything, Everywhere, All at Once” ahead. If you haven’t seen this masterpiece you MUST go see it.

item.title: Social Media
item.description: My social media usage skyrocketed during the pandemic â€” and subsequently tanked. Before then I was a little dopamine monkey perking up at every comment, DM, and message that came my way.
